item.start_core.bacteria_dormant.tooltip: Â§7Reawaken this colony and discover its secrets
behaviour.start_core.bacteria.any_affini: Â§dCan be any one of the affinities
behaviour.start_core.bacteria.harvester_: Â§7Actual sludge consumption is Â§625 * (2 << Metabolism)

Â§7Actual primary fluid output amount is Â§62000mB * Production

Â§7Actual tertiary fluid output amount is Â§6320mB * Production
behaviour.start_core.bacteria.input: Â§7A Bacteria with any stats & affinities can be inputted
behaviour.start_core.bacteria.vat_same_o: Â§7Replicated bacteria with same stats & affinities as input
behaviour.start_core.bacteria.vat_mutate: Â§6Mutated Â§7bacteria with mutated stats but the same affinities as input
behaviour.start_core.bacteria.mutator_af: Â§6Mutated Â§7bacteria with random stats and affinities from input, but same type
behaviour.start_core.bacteria.mutator_to: Â§6Mutated Â§7bacteria with random stats, affinities and type.
block.start_core.runic_mutator_descripti: Â§7Using runic-age technologies, bacterial colonies are mutated through extreme genetic alterations to their biological structures, either reawakening dormant colonies or reshaping existing ones into novel types.
block.start_core.rm1: Â§7Reawaken dormant colonies into a randomised bacterial colony with random stats, affinities and type.
block.start_core.rm4: Â§7Mutate bacterial colonies, changing their stats and affinities randomly along with their type depending on the type of runic plating used.
block.start_core.harvester_description: Â§7A precision bio-extraction device designed to process awakened bacterial colonies. It harnesses all outputs generated by the bacteria, feeding and accelerating their metabolic processes to maximize yield. The extraction process culminates in the bacteria's termination.
block.start_core.hv1: Â§7Extract primary, secondary, and tertiary outputs from bacterial colonies. Â§7The specific primary, secondary and tertiary outputs are determined by the Â§5Affinities Â§7of the bacteria.
block.start_core.hv3: Â§7The amount of primary output extracted is equal to Â§f2000mB * Production Â§7of the bacteria.
block.start_core.hv4: Â§7The amount of secondary output extracted is equal to Â§f1240mB * Production Â§7of the bacteria.
block.start_core.hv5: Â§7The amount of tertiary output extracted is equal to Â§f320mB * Production Â§7of the bacteria.
block.start_core.hv6: Â§7The consumption of the bacteria scales with the Â§fMetabolism Â§7of the bacteria.
block.start_core.vat_description: Â§7A specialized bioreactor designed for rapid bacterial replication and evolution. It processes a single bacterial sample, outputting duplicates while simultaneously producing mutated variants, fostering both consistency and diversity for experimental or industrial applications.
block.start_core.vat2: Â§7Replicate and mutate bacterial colonies, producing a large amount for usage in Harvesting or Mutation.
block.start_core.vat3: Â§7Produces Â§f16x ReplicatedÂ§7 bacteria with the exact same type, stats and affinities.
block.start_core.vat4: Â§7Produces Â§f16x MutatedÂ§7 bacteria with the exact same type and affinities, but mutated stats depending on the Â§fMutatability Â§7of the bacteria.
block.start_core.uhv_auxiliary_boosted_f: Auxiliary Boosted Fusion Reactor MK I
block.start_core.uiv_auxiliary_boosted_f: Auxiliary Boosted Fusion Reactor MK II
start_core.machine.auxiliary_boosted_fus: Â§7A high-efficiency fusion reactor that utilises auxiliary fusion coils to enhance fusion reactions, enabling for higher density of fusion reactions taking place within the chamber at once
Â§7The reactor only takes {0} energy hatches, Each hatch increases the buffer of the reactor by {1}M EU
block.start_core.auxiliary_boosted_fusio: Auxiliary Boosted Fusion Casing MK I
Auxiliary Boosted Fusion Casing MK II
start_core.machine.fusion_reactor.overcl: Â§7Overclocks double energy and halve duration.
start_core.machine.auxiliary_boosted_fus: Â§7Any Absolute Parallel Mastery Hatches can be used enabling high rates of production.
start_core.multiblock.uev_fusion_reactor: The Fusion Reactor MK 4 is a large multiblock structure used for fusing elements into heavier ones. It can only use UEV Energy Hatches. For every Hatch it has, its buffer increases by 80M EU, and has a maximum of 1280M.
start_core.machine.parallel_hatch_mk5.to: Allows to run up to 1024 recipes in parallel.
start_core.machine.parallel_hatch_mk6.to: Allows to run up to 2048 recipes in parallel.
start_core.machine.parallel_hatch_mk7.to: Allows to run up to 4096 recipes in parallel.
start_core.machine.absolute_parallel_hat: Allows to run up to 4 recipes in parallel.
Allows to run up to 8 recipes in parallel.
Allows to run up to 16 recipes in parallel.
Â§6Without extra energy consumption per parallel.

start_core.dream_link.cover.tooltip: Â§7Supplies Â§f2Â§eA Â§f%d (%sÂ§f) Â§7from the Dream-Network as a cover
start_core.machine.dream_link_tower.beam: Â§7The node focuses it's beam on a single device until it is full before continuing with the next. Allocation priority is determined based on the proximity of the device to the tower, with closer devices receiving energy first.
start_core.machine.dream_link_tower.rang: Â§7The node has a maximum square-radius of Â§d{0} Â§7blocks around it
start_core.machine.dream_link_tower.conn: Â§7The node has a maximum connections of Â§d{0}
start_core.machine.dream_link_tower.infi: Â§7The node has a Â§dinfiniteÂ§7 connections
start_core.machine.dream_link_tower.copy: Â§7The dream-network of this node can be copied using a Â§fLucinducer
start_core.machine.dream_link_node.descr: Â§7Focuses a beam of energy through the dreamscape enabling lossless wireless transfer of energy to compatible dream-link devices.
start_core.machine.oneiric_relay.descrip: Â§7Refines and amplifies dream-energy pathways, enabling a greater distance for beams to travel through the dreamscape.
start_core.machine.daydream_spire.descri: Â§7Manipulates semi-lucid thought currents for extended dreamscape energy transmission.
start_core.machine.beacon_of_lucidity.de: Â§7Channels pure lucid clarity to maintain dream-link integrity across the entire dreamscape of a dimension.
start_core.machine.paragon_of_the_veil.d: Â§7The Paragon integrates directly with the substrate of the dream realm itself. Rather than projecting energy, it becomes a universal synchronisation anchor, allowing instantaneous energy transmission to all connected dream-link devices, regardless of dimension.
start_core.machine.dream_link_tower.beac: Â§7The beacon has Â§dunlimited range Â§7in the same dimension as it
start_core.machine.dream_link_tower.para: Â§7The Paragon has Â§dunlimited cross-dimensional range
behaviour.start_core.hellforge.input_hea: Â§fAdds Â§l%sMKÂ§rÂ§f to the Hadean Crucible
behaviour.start_core.hellforge.max_heat: Â§cMaximum temperature of this heating fluid is Â§l%sMK
block.start_core.hellforge_description: Â§7A towering infernal crucible that harnesses the Heart of the Flame to fuel its relentless fires, demanding fluid offerings to awaken its molten fury.
block.start_core.hellforge_d1: Â§7The hell forge utilises the crucible to alloy materials together at an extreme temperature, but the Heart of the Flame cannot heat the crucible itself.
block.start_core.hellforge_d2: Â§7Provide different Â§cHeating Fluids Â§7to the hell forge to heat up the crucible. Each fluid has a maximum temperature that it can heat the crucible to.
block.start_core.hellforge_d9: Â§7These heating recipes will always be prioritised over the other recipes.
block.start_core.hellforge_d3: Â§7The hell forge will always lose Â§95MK Â§7of its heat every 10 seconds. When dormant the hell forge loses an additional Â§9120MKÂ§7 every 10 seconds.
block.start_core.hellforge_d6: Â§7For every n Â§c450MKÂ§7 over the recipe requirement, the hell forge gains 2^n absolute parallels.
block.start_core.hellforge_d8: Â§7Provides Â§fPercentage to nMK Â§7indicators for each heating fluid temperature cap.
start_core.redstone_hatch.d0: Provides access to redstone indicators for multiblock automation
start_core.redstone_hatch.d1: Â§6Functionality depends on the multiblock to interface with
start_core.machine.abyssal_harvester.des: Â§7Absorbs the latent tides of the end abyss, the harvester draws forth exotic abyssal fluids from dimensional fractures and concentrates it as a material fluid.
start_core.machine.abyssal_harvester.ah1: Â§7The abyssal harvester will continually become more and more saturated with the latent abyss allowing for different blends of outcomes.
start_core.machine.abyssal_harvester.ah2: Â§7The machine will always gain abyssal saturation at Â§f0.55% per 5sÂ§7 up to a maximum of Â§f120.00%Â§7.
start_core.machine.abyssal_harvester.ah3: Â§7Running recipes in the harvester will decrease the current saturation by Â§f5.00%Â§7.
start_core.machine.abyssal_harvester.ah5: Â§7When the Saturation is within a Â§f+5.00% or -5.00%Â§7 range of Â§f22.50%, 52.50%, or 82.50%Â§7 it gets a free 2x parallel.
start_core.machine.abyssal_harvester.ah6: Â§7Provides Â§fPercentage to n saturation percent Â§7indicators for certain n.
start_core.machine.sterile_hatch.tooltip: Makes your Multiblocks extra squeaky clean and sterile!
start_core.uuid_safe.fail_nearest_player: Issue regarding UUID's occured, Please visit Dream-Link at %s and consider replacing if Owner is not correct.
start_core.abyssal_containment_room.acr0: Â§7You think you peer into its silence... but silence is the tongue of eternity, and Â§keternityÂ§rÂ§7 has already spoken your name.
start_core.abyssal_containment_room.acr2: Â§7Provides a simulation of the Â§5True Abyss Â§7for all machines placed inside much like a Cleanroom. Due to the nature of the abyss, Â§fprotection as utilised in the end is advisedÂ§7.
start_core.abyssal_containment_room.acr4: Â§7In order to maintain the abyssal containment, Â§e100000B of End AirÂ§7 and Â§d50B Dragon BreathÂ§7 per hour must be supplied to the room.

block.start_core.threading_controller.to:
Allows you to access and control the threading system by assigning points to various stats.
Â§6The available points depend on the helixes you have installed in the multiblock structure.
The current amount of each threading component block in this machine
These points can be assigned to any others
View different points and their current assignments, along with assigning points from Generalis to others
0.5^a Modifier per 100 * sum(a) Points. (1 - 0.5^a) * 100 Percent Duration Reduction. Where 'a' is the desired times duration halved
1 Parallel per 20 Points. Increases duration by Parallel^0.5
1 Thread per 5 Points (Each thread processes a different recipe type)
Assign 1 Generalis to this (SHIFT for 5), (CTRL for 20), (SHIFT + CTRL for max)
Unassign 1 Generalis from this (SHIFT for 5), (CTRL for 20), (SHIFT + CTRL for max)
